name: Cheese-Buster Burgers
description: A deliciously cheesy inside-out burger! Recruit a 3-in-1 Burger to make the job even easier!

ingredients.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning or Cheesy Fries Seasoning
Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning

preparation: Stir cream cheese with fries seasoning. Divide into 6 nuggets, then place in freezer.
Meanwhile, whisk together egg (if using), ketchup, and Burger Seasoning. Mix in beef. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 12 skinny patties.
Remove cheese mixture from freezer. Place a cheese nugget in the centre of each of 6 patties. Cover with remaining patties. Press each around the edges to seal, making 6 large patties.
Grill on the barbecue over medium-high heat with lid closed for 5 minutes. Flip patties and continue grilling for 3–4 minutes.
Toast buns, if desired. Tuck burgers into buns with additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Mix 1⁄4 cup Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix or dry breadcrumbs into ground beef mixture for a more tender texture to your burgers.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies and 2 tbsp Epicure Dip.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favorite.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!
